entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
